query:
SELECT 
  DAYNAME(entryDate) as day_of_week,
  DAYOFWEEK(entryDate) as day_num,
  COUNT(*) as trade_count,
  SUM(pnl) / 100 as total_pnl_dollars
FROM trades
WHERE entryDate IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DAYNAME(entryDate), DAYOFWEEK(entryDate)
ORDER BY DAYOFWEEK(entryDate);

  DAYOFWEEK(entryDate) as day_num,

WHERE entryDate IS NOT NULL
